pageBlocks.heroMessage: Sheds new light on a complex process. The most informed way to move from Sold to Exchange.

pageBlocks.sectionTitle: Your simplest, most understandable move yet.

sectionCards.cardBody: Most of the stress of moving comes from not knowing what’s happening when. Spend less time chasing and more time dreaming about your new home.
Invite your agent to use View My Chain as they can help speed up your move by up to 2 weeks and reduce the chance of your move falling through by a third.
Track every step of your move from the moment you agree the price to collecting your keys, anywhere, any time. Being able to spot delays and act fast will keep things moving.

carouselItems.feedbackMessage: The service I received up until the point of ‘sold-subject-to-contract’ was great – they would answer my questions around the clock. However, after that point I was left in the dark, so View My Chain was vital for me to see how the sale was progressing. It was invaluable.
carouselItems.blurb: The service I received up until the point of ‘sold-subject-to-contract’ was great – they would answer my questions around the clock. However, after that point I was left in the dark, so View My Chain was vital for me to see how the sale was progressing. It was invaluable.

carouselItems.feedbackMessage: My chain fell through 2 times because of my buyer. I was desperate for it not to happen a 3rd time. I decided to use a different agent using View My Chain. It was a great decision as when the chain looked like it was going to fail the agent stopped it and we all completed.
carouselItems.blurb: My chain fell through 2 times because of my buyer. I was desperate for it not to happen a 3rd time. I decided to use a different agent using View My Chain. It was a great decision as when the chain looked like it was going to fail the agent stopped it and we all completed.

carouselItems.feedbackMessage: After my last house move I was dreading going through the process again but View My Chain completely changed the experience of moving. Having complete visibility of how our buyer and seller were progressing made the process less stressful and we were confident that our estate agent was working to move us as fast as possible.
carouselItems.blurb: After my last house move I was dreading going through the process again but View My Chain completely changed the experience of moving. Having complete visibility of how our buyer and seller were progressing made the process less stressful and we were confident that our estate agent was working to move us as fast as possible.

carouselItems.feedbackMessage: I have found using View My Chain extremely useful as I can see what progress is being made throughout the chain. I would recommend it to anyone buying a property because it removes that frustrated feeling of being in limbo and waiting for someone to be in touch.
carouselItems.blurb: I have found using View My Chain extremely useful as I can see what progress is being made throughout the chain. I would recommend it to anyone buying a property because it removes that frustrated feeling of being in limbo and waiting for someone to be in touch.

carouselItems.feedbackMessage: View My Chain really helped me through the mystery of buying our first family home. Being able to check how it was progressing when it was convenient for me was great when I was trying to juggle work and family.
carouselItems.blurb: View My Chain really helped me through the mystery of buying our first family home. Being able to check how it was progressing when it was convenient for me was great when I was trying to juggle work and family.
